Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory895.jpg'}
{1: 'Planning Headquarters - Hydrangea Island Commercial', 2: 'Misono Corporation', 4: 'Morning, November - Pleasant and Dry'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Here's my entry application for the island. I've brought all the required documents. Is everything in order?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Documentation Officer', 3: 'Dr. Saotome, your documentation is indeed complete, however...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "What's wrong?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Documentation Officer', 3: "If you'll pardon my frankness, your research history is marred by several incidents—drug abuse, unauthorized experiments, and more...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Aren't you all well aware of these matters already?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Are you people seriously hung up on these things now when I'm already here on your invitation?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Documentation Officer', 3: "We absolutely support your research principles. In fact, it's precisely your adventurous approach that caught our interest.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Documentation Officer', 3: 'However, the list of personnel for the island landing will need to be submitted to the Science Council for review...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Documentation Officer', 3: "And as I'm sure you're aware, those people aren't as... accommodating as we are.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Documentation Officer', 3: 'How do you think they would react if they saw your name listed among the teaching staff?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Documentation Officer', 3: "They would immediately connect your radical methods with the island's research direction...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Documentation Officer', 3: 'Not only would they deny your entry to the island, but the entire Hydrangea Island business initiative would fall through as well.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Letting cowards dictate the direction of scientific research is a disgrace to all of humanity.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Documentation Officer', 3: 'With that said, though, there might be a way to work around this...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Documentation Officer', 3: 'We can disguise our research under the pretext of "education" by establishing a school.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Documentation Officer', 3: 'College research projects tend to attract attention, but a high school would be relatively safer.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Documentation Officer', 3: 'Common sense dictates that no one would expect a high school to be capable of conducting cutting-edge research.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Documentation Officer', 3: 'If you could come to the island posing as a "guardian" of a high school student...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Documentation Officer', 3: 'We can then keep your name concealed under the "family members of the students" going to the island.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'You want me to play the role of an accompanying parent?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Documentation Officer', 3: 'Indeed, we have successful precedents for this approach.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "There's a fundamental and obvious flaw in your assumption.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "I don't have any children. In fact, I'm not even married.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Documentation Officer', 3: 'I completely understand your situation. It must be difficult to balance both career and family life successfully.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Do you have anything else to add?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Documentation Officer', 3: 'Hm, have you considered adoption...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Adoption?', 4: '2'}
{3: "An unsettling smile creeps across the Documentation Officer's face as he pulls a business card from his drawer."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Documentation Officer', 3: "Perhaps you'd like to learn more about this?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Reika takes the card. It bears the address of an orphanage.'}
{2: 'Documentation Officer', 3: "This is a welfare institution we've worked with before.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Documentation Officer', 3: "I'll give them a call later. Someone will be there to greet you when you arrive.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Documentation Officer', 3: 'Leave all the adoption paperwork to us.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory22.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Welfare Facility - Misono Corporation'}
{3: 'The address on the card leads to a secluded welfare institution. Reika pushes the door open with hesitation.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory15.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory15.jpg'}
{3: "In the courtyard of an aged western-style mansion, a middle-aged man awaits Reika's arrival."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Director', 3: 'You must be Ms. Saotome?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Yes, that's right.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Director', 3: 'Please follow me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Director', 3: 'We understand this is just a formality... but please select a child that matches your disposition.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Director', 3: 'You see, even photographs can be questioned, so we exercise caution in every detail.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory639.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory639.jpg'}
{3: 'The director pushes open the heavy doors behind him. Under the incandescent lights, floating dust particles force Reika to cover her nose and mouth.'}
{3: 'Several boys and girls in elegant Western dresses gather around Reika as soon as they spot her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Boy 1', 3: "Good evening, ma'am.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boy 2', 3: "How has your day been, ma'am?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Not too bad.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Girl 1', 3: "Ma'am, I simply adore your outfit and hairstyle!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Girl 2', 3: "Ma'am, would you honor me with a moment of conversation?", 4: '2'}
{3: "Confronted with the children's unexpectedly enthusiastic reception, Reika finds herself at a loss for a response."}
{3: "She carefully maneuvers away from the children's encirclement, taking a quick glance at their unnaturally pristine faces."}
{3: "It doesn't take long for her to detect the concealed apathy beneath their overwhelming enthusiasm."}
{3: 'Their contempt for the world seeps through the carefully trained pleasantries their handlers instilled in them...'}
{3: 'These emotions subtly dance across their young, innocent faces.'}
{3: 'Their ingratiating smiles fail to win Reika over, instead creating an invisible barrier between them.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Director', 3: 'As you can see, we have bright children of all ages.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Director', 3: 'Jack to your left excels in mathematics, while Dora beside him shows remarkable talent in physics...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Director', 3: "They're all exceptional children. Does anyone catch your eye?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Why do I have to search for my own reflection? Do you enjoy staring into mirrors?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Director', 3: "Haha, that's not what I meant. Let's move along. I'm sure we'll find a child to your satisfaction.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Reika trudges forward with resignation as the children greet her one after another.'}
{3: 'As she approaches the stairs, a cough echoes from the corner.'}
{3: 'The abrupt cough cuts through the cheerful atmosphere like a cold wind through warmth...'}
{1: '1', 3: "Curiosity draws Reika's gaze to a girl curled up alone in the corner."}
{3: 'The girl, noticeably older than the other children, is absorbed in a book.'}
{3: "Something about the girl stirs memories of Reika's own childhood..."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory58.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Back then, Reika, too, would sit alone in corners, clutching her books.'}
{3: 'Lonely, focused, lost in her own world.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory639.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Director', 3: 'Ah, that child...', 4: '1'}
{3: "The director notices Reika's lingering gaze and shifts uncomfortably."}
{2: 'Director', 3: 'Some of our clients have taken her home before, but she always ends up being returned shortly after.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Director', 3: "She has a weak constitution due to a congenital heart condition. The doctors don't think she'll make it past adolescence.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: '"Clients", you say?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Reika turns to the man beside her with a fierce glare.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'You must be making a fortune treating these children like merchandise for sale.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Director', 3: 'Pardon my rudeness, Ms. Saotome, but...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Director', 3: "You came here despite knowing all this, so I assume you're not particularly troubled by it?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Reika Saotome lets out a soft sigh, deciding not to pursue the matter further.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "What's her name?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Director', 3: 'Yuka.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Reika walks over to Yuka who is sitting on the ground and seems to have noticed her presence.'}
{3: 'As the footsteps come to a stop, Yuka carefully closes her book and sets it aside.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: '"The Flower\'s Way of Acting"... Thinking about becoming an actress?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka', 3: "No, I'm just reading it for fun.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka', 3: 'Do you enjoy it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "I don't really understand art. At best, I only know how to make things look pretty on the surface.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka', 3: 'But I noticed your shoes, they have such delicately embroidered hydrangeas on them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka', 3: "You're quite detail-oriented, aren't you?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl adjusts her posture to sit formally on her knees, looking up to observe the adult before her.'}
{3: 'Reika holds her breath instinctively at those melancholic eyes.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Just like a porcelain doll...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Director', 3: "Beautiful child, isn't she? Like a delicate piece of art.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Without warning, Reika kneels down to sit at eye level with the girl, examining her carefully.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Director', 3: 'Oh my! What are you doing?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Would you like to come home with me?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Taking my surname... you might face a lot of hatred from people in the future.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Even knowing this, would you still want to?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka', 3: "Not many visitors here would bother to initiate a conversation with me. I can tell you're a good person.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Perhaps I'm just being hypocritical.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'The Saotome family has always been good at producing two-faced philanthropists.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka', 3: 'No, I find you interesting.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Do you really think so?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "You silly child. I'm just trying to use you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka', 3: 'Well then, please do use me as you wish.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'You...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "No, never mind... Yuka. That's a beautiful name.", 4: '2'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory699.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory699.jpg'}
{3: 'When Reika steps out of the welfare institution, she sees the world outside blanketed in heavy snow.'}
{3: 'Against the vast white expanse, the black executive car from the Neuroscience Symposium stands out starkly.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'The adoption procedure... sure is disgustingly efficient.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Well then, Yuka, please wait here for now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "I'll come back for you once the symposium is over.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "A flash of disappointment crosses the girl's calm face before quickly fading away."}
{3: 'As if deliberately hiding something, she clasps her hands behind her back and gazes at Reika with feigned innocence.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Have a safe journey.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1074.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Guess this is it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'After that, instead of returning to the orphanage, Yuka followed my car for hours... until she collapsed in the snow.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'When I went back for her, I was told she had already been taken to the hospital.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The sound of the tide draws ever closer.'}
{3: 'Reika closes her eyes once more.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory699.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Have a safe journey.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Reika stops in her tracks and turns to face the girl.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chauffeur', 3: 'Dr. Saotome, the meeting will begin in 30 minutes. Please be mindful of the time.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "No, I won't be going.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Under Yuka's stunned gaze, Reika walks back, step by step."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Yuka, I need your assistance with an experiment.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'I would be glad to help.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "I haven't even told you what the experiment is yet.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Whatever you need, I'll do it.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Reika stops in front of Yuka, shielding her from the snow and wind.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'To observe the developmental patterns of human consciousness, I need you to become a "normal girl".', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I don't quite understand, but I'll do my best.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yuka hesitates for a moment before speaking again.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'If I am to be a "normal girl", does that make you my "mother"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Researchers often refer to their research subjects as their "children" and see themselves as "mothers".', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'I see.', 4: '1'}
{3: "A flicker of confusion crosses Yuka's eyes as she slightly pulls back the hands hidden behind her back."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'The mother-daughter relationship in human society is too emotionally charged. It would interfere with the proper execution of our experiments.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Meeting Yuka's melancholic gaze, Reika suddenly realizes she's been trying to justify herself."}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Then how should I address you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Please call me "Dr. Saotome".', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Yes, Dr. Saotome.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Despite standing close together, Reika still feels an insurmountable distance between herself and Yuka.'}
{3: "Without thinking, she takes two steps forward, removes her coat, and drapes it over Yuka's shoulders."}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Huh?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The sudden gesture catches Yuka off guard, forcing her to move her hands from behind her back.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Is this... a hydrangea?', 4: '2'}
{3: "Reika points at the white paper flower in Yuka's palm."}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Yes... it's a flower I made for you, but... I haven't colored it yet.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Thank you. I see you're very good at making things.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "If you don't mind, let's color it together when we get back to my place.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Thank you very much, Dr. Saotome.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A smile naturally breaks across her face.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Yuka, I need you to be a "normal girl".', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Yuka nods with a hint of confusion, seemingly surprised that Reika is now repeating this request.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "This is the only experiment I need you to participate in. There won't be any others.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Since this is an experiment, I need to constantly record data on your development.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Even as a researcher, daily interaction with you is essential.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'We even need to live together in the same residential space, as what human society calls "mother and daughter".', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Every year, I compile my research findings into papers and publish them in neuroscience journals.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'This project will be my sole focus of work when I arrive on the island.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Therefore, I need you to focus solely on your growth. Can you do that?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Yes, Dr. Saotome... I'd be happy to do so.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Reika nods.'}
{3: 'Looking around, the snow and wind have gradually subsided. Rays of sunlight now pour onto the earth, bringing with them a gentle warmth.'}
{3: 'Reika and Yuka walk together through the snow, leaving two trails of footprints—one large, one small.'}
{3: 'Reika looks up at the sky with contentment before speaking slowly.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Well then, Yuka, I look forward to our time together.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Yes, Dr. Saotome, I'll do my very best!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1074.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Reika opens her eyes.'}
{3: 'With a gentle smile gracing her lips as she lies there, Yuka appears to be in a peaceful slumber.'}
{3: 'The Red Tide roars through the corridor, swallowing everything in its path.'}
{3: 'Reika falls to her knees, holding Yuka tightly in her arms as she curls around her protectively.'}
{3: 'For the last time, she closes her eyes.'}
